content.title: Funding
content.paragraph: Here at Mogul Management we believe in offering creative alternative methods of full spectrum financing. We pride ourselves in exceeding our clients expectations from the initial consultation call to the tail end closing of the loan. We base our funding solely off your business profile or your credit profile. Funding starts anywhere from $15,000 to $500,000. Fill in link below for a free consultation!
list: Cost to client: Success-based fee, no upfront fees, based on the total funding amount
Funding under 35k+ = 11.99%. Funding over 35k = 9.99% (Ex. Client funding for 50k would be invoiced $4,995)
